captions.text:
-You ready for this?
-Not really.
It'll be fine!

Chris, we have
something to tell you--

-I think that went well!
-You threw up and we both left.

-That's all in the past.
-It was literally 30 seconds ago.

-That's a matter of opinion.
-No it isn't. Let's try again.

Chris, we have something
to tell you.

-I chloroformed myself, didn't I?
-Yeah, you did.
Don't do it again!!

Look - you take
the lead this time.
[nonsensical rambling]

You see, the thing is,
Jenny and I--

-I'll just kill him.
-Woah, woah!!

-LET ME SHOOT HIM IN THE FACE
-NO NO!!
Mum! Dad! I'm gay!
WRONG. I hope...

IF I SHOOT HIM, WE CAN MAKE OUT!
THIS COULD BE SO EASY!

-When two people spend a lot of time together--
-Where are your legs?!

-[Tom speaks German]
-Nein!
Chris--

-I'm from the future! Tell him he's ugly!
-You're chubby!
You can't even get THAT right?!

-Thomas. THOMAS.
-Give me the...no!

-I'm really bad at this, aren't I?
-Yeah, Chris is never gonna find out about us.
Oh, THAT'S what we're doing?!

Chris, I know this is hard for you
to hear, but I'm dating your sister.
Yeah, that's fine--
WHOOPS.
I think that went well.

comments.author: Kevin G.

comments.text:
Dear Diary,
Nothing much happened today.
Tom kept coming into my room with my sister and throwing up, trying to 
shoot me, pretending to be gay, speaking in fluent German, talking to an 
alternate dimension version of himself who told him to tell me I was ugly 
and threatening to shoot me in the face. He then admitted he was dating my 
sister and shot me.
Once the doctors had removed the bullet, sewn me up and allowed me to come 
home I made myself a toasted sandwich. Unfortunately the grill didn't work 
and I had to eat a half toasted sandwich!
It was the most traumatic moment of my life!!!
Tomorrow I'm going to buy one of those toasted sandwich makers so I can 
avoid this happening again.

-- Chris﻿
